about_the_game:
Step into the world of nightclub management with this free Prologue, where you'll take control of a small, run-down venue and attempt to breathe life back into it. Renovate, upgrade, and make crucial decisions as you get a glimpse of the full game’s mechanics and the challenges of running a nightclub.

However, it won’t be all fun and games—you’ll need to handle rowdy customers, balance your budget, and create a unique club atmosphere that defines your brand. Will you bring elegance and exclusivity to your venue, or embrace the wild side of nightlife?

This Prologue offers a limited experience of the full game, allowing you to explore a portion of the club management mechanics, test your skills, and experience the thrill of building a nightclub empire—all for free! Are you ready to take your first steps into the world of nightlife?

The best graphics in the co-op simulation genre you'll ever play. Developed with Unreal Engine 5.

Dynamic customer AI behaviors and spontaneous events for a more immersive experience.

Boost the club’s prestige and customer satisfaction by adding features like a stripper, condom machines, and other premium amenities.

Manage who gets in and collect entrance fees to maintain control and maximize profits at the door.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game does not feature full nudity but includes suggestive themes, sexual innuendos, and fantasy-themed outfits. The game also contains depictions of alcohol consumption and rowdy nightclub behavior. However, there are no explicit sexual acts, non-consensual content, or drug use beyond alcohol consumption.

Step into the world of nightclub management with this free Prologue, where you'll take control of a small, run-down venue and attempt to breathe life back into it. Renovate, upgrade, and make crucial decisions as you get a glimpse of the full game’s mechanics and the challenges of running a nightclub.

However, it won’t be all fun and games—you’ll need to handle rowdy customers, balance your budget, and create a unique club atmosphere that defines your brand. Will you bring elegance and exclusivity to your venue, or embrace the wild side of nightlife?

This Prologue offers a limited experience of the full game, allowing you to explore a portion of the club management mechanics, test your skills, and experience the thrill of building a nightclub empire—all for free! Are you ready to take your first steps into the world of nightlife?

name: Night Club Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (recent generation)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050TI or better 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 12 GB SSD available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (recent generation)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 or better 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 12 GB SSD available space

short_description: Run a nightclub in this free Prologue! Renovate, upgrade, and manage rowdy customers. Get a taste of the full game’s challenges as you shape your club’s atmosphere and rise in nightlife!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Danish, Indonesian, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian, Russian*, Thai, Turkish*, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
